package.name: octomap

description.brief: 3D occupancy grid mapping based on octrees.

package.description: The OctoMap library implements a 3D occupancy grid mapping approach, providing data structures and mapping algorithms in C++. The map implementation is based on an octree. See http://octomap.sf.net for details.
